errors.message: @param tag description should start with capital letter
'if' child has incorrect indentation level 56, expected level should be 16.
'if rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 52, expected level should be 12.
'}' at column 53 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
'else' has incorrect indentation level 0, expected level should be 12.
'else' child has incorrect indentation level 9, expected level should be 16.
'else rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 5, expected level should be 12.
'}' at column 9 should be on the same line as the next part of a multi-block statement (one that directly contains multiple blocks: if/else-if/else, do/while or try/catch/finally).
'catch' has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be 8.
'catch' child has incorrect indentation level 16, expected level should be 12.
'catch rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be 8.
'(' has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be 16.
